labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.title: com.lemon.lvoverseas

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.8

### What type of problem have you encountered?

comment.body:
Hmm... On my side if I make exceptions to the cookie removal rules, it works (need to refresh twice):

```adb
@@||globaltv.com^$cookie=/^AMCVS?_.*AdobeOrg/
@@||globaltv.com^$cookie=s_cc
@@||globaltv.com^$cookie=s_ppv
@@||globaltv.com^$cookie=s_tp
```

However, if I'm not wrong, they are checking the bait class `.topAds` is hidden or not, and as I see we already have the rule `@@||watch.globaltv.com^$generichide`, it should not be hidden, but when I debugged it, that class is still hidden:

<details><summary>Detection script</summary>

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/3cb201a6-beb4-4085-aa89-37f0f1ce3ba7)

</details>

<details><summary>Bait class is still hidden despite `generichide`</summary>

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/6486b665-8567-488c-8a6c-279b78ec7a01)

</details>

I tried `globaltv.com#$#.topAds { display: block !important; }` but not successful.

---

@AdguardTeam/filters-maintainers Sorry, can anyone check this?
